body: You have dwarven blood coursing through your veins.
name: Dwarf Blooded
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Oreads/New Racial Rules/Oread Feats/Dwarf Blooded

sections.body: Your dwarven heritage manifests in two ways. First, your speed is never modified by armor or encumbrance, as the dwarf slow and steady racial trait. Second, you gain the stonecunning dwarf racial trait.
sections.name: Benefit
